title: Have you read How to Win Friends and Influence People? Did reading it change the way you think? - Quora
tags: How to Win Friends and Influence People (1936 book)

response.answer_text: I have read it several times and at the time, years ago, it did change the way I think. The book dates back to the 1930’s so the language and some of the concepts are definitely getting a bit dated. But, I think that book, like any book, has some useful messages for the reader. I read it quite recently and I still think it is a useful book. Is it the best book ever? certainly not, but there is good stuff in there if you are willing to be open minded.

I may have read it a long time ago, I don’t remember. If you want to know what I think of it now, read (or skim) Self help messiah: Dale Carnegie and success in modern America, by Steven Watts. It discusses its good points and bad points.
